name: Allinpay INTL
author: aipsg

sections.description:
Description: Allinpay INTL is a WooCommerce payment gateway plugin that allows customers to make international payments using Allinpay. Features: – Accept international payments through Allinpay. – Secure and reliable payment processing. – Easy integration with your WooCommerce store. Installation: 1. Upload the ‘allinpay-intl’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory. 2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress. 3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments, and enable the “Allinpay INTL” payment method. 4. Configure the required settings for the payment gateway, such as your Allinpay account credentials. 5. Save changes, and you’re ready to accept international payments with Allinpay. Changelog: = 1.0.0 = – Initial release. = 1.0.1 = Made some optimizations = 1.0.2 = Made some optimizations = 1.0.3 = Made some optimizations FAQ: Q: Can I use this plugin for domestic payments? A: No, Allinpay INTL is designed specifically for international payments. Q: How do I get the necessary API credentials for Allinpay? A: You will need to sign up for an Allinpay merchant account and obtain the API credentials from their platform. Support: For support or assistance with this plugin, please visit our support forum: https://example.com/support/ Screenshots: 1. Screenshot 1: Payment method selection on the checkout page. 2. Screenshot 2: Configuration settings for the Allinpay INTL payment gateway.

License

This plugin is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 2 of the License, or any later version.

This plugin is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this plugin. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.
